entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The group responsible for the management of the business and the conduct of the affairs of the corporation, consisting of multiple directors

entities.name: DIRECTORS
entities.description: Individuals serving on the Board of Directors, elected to hold office for a term expiring at the next annual meeting of stockholders

entities.name: STOCKHOLDERS
entities.description: Individuals or entities who hold shares of the corporation's stock, entitled to vote at an election of directors

relationships.relationship_description: The Board of Directors consists of multiple directors who are elected to hold office for a term expiring at the next annual meeting of stockholders
Stockholders are entitled to vote at an election of directors, thus influencing the composition of the Board of Directors
